item.title: More information about Spanish lesson
item.description: Queridos padres de 1EE, We are already in the fourth week of this period. And I think we are getting a good rhythm of learning. As 1EE teacher, I am following the same learning system like Senorita Maria Castro but with some modifications that I consider beneficial with working with children. Every week I send home homework, between math exercises, reading with Letrilandia or yellow study notebook. I will try to send only one thing each week, because I consider that with the DVDs and a little bit of homework it is enough for the children.

item.title: Email for parents with wma
item.description: Hola a todos, This week they are taking Letrilandia home. I have put yellow book too even if it isn’t a new page, for those who would like to have a look songs, matific, links… In Letrilandia you can review previous letters and you can have a look "s, n, 単 and t." You can find audio attached. You can have a look the tales here: Se単orita del silencio: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BQgFQO5uDbs
